TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ClientTarget extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class ClientTarget Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 定義與目標使用者代理程式相關聯的別名 (ASP.NET 伺服器控制項應當為此代理程式呈現內容)。

span.span: Defines the alias associated with the target user agent for which ASP.NET server controls should render content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別中所新增的項目會參考`clientTarget`組態檔區段。The class refers to elements that are added in the `clientTarget` section of the configuration file. 類別所屬的群組，其中包含類別和類別。The class belongs to a group that includes the class and the class. 類別包含用來識別用戶端瀏覽器中，也稱為使用者代理程式的兩個屬性。The class contains two properties identifying a client browser, also named user agent. 其中一個屬性是依第二個屬性來識別用戶端瀏覽器相關聯的別名。One property is the alias associated with the client browser identified by the second property. ASP.NET 會使用這項資訊來呈現伺服器控制項在網頁中。ASP.NET uses this information to render server controls in a page. 如何使用以程式設計方式的使用者代理程式或其別名的相關資訊，請參閱屬性。For information about how the user agent or its alias is used programmatically, see the property. 如需如何使用以宣告方式的使用者代理程式或其別名的詳細資訊，請參閱[@ Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4)。For information about how the user agent or its alias is used declaratively, see [@ Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4). 如果未設定屬性，相關聯的物件屬性會反映用戶端瀏覽器的功能。If the property is not set, the object that is associated with the property reflects the capabilities of the client browser. （它反映功能的瀏覽器類型，但不是一定是在該瀏覽器的特定執行個體中的設定）。如果屬性設定，已停用用戶端瀏覽器偵測和頁面會使用與您所定義的使用者代理字串相關聯的瀏覽器功能。(It reflects the capabilities of the browser type, but not necessarily the settings in a specific instance of that browser.) If the property is set, the client browser detection is disabled and the page uses browser capabilities that are associated with the user agent string that you define. 您可以設定此屬性至任何有效的使用者代理字串。You can set this property to any valid user agent string. ## Examples 本節提供兩個程式碼範例。This section provides two code examples. 第一個範例示範如何以宣告方式指定值的數個屬性類別。The first demonstrates how to declaratively specify values for several properties of the class. 第二個示範濆爧髍孮從組態檔的物件。The second shows how to obtain the object from the configuration file. 您可以使用這個物件來存取它所包含的物件。You use this object to access the objects it contains. 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式指定值的數個屬性類別。The following code example shows how to declaratively specify values for several properties of the class. ``` ``` 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得從組態檔的物件。The following code example shows how to obtain the object from the configuration file. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget/CS/clienttarget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget/VB/clienttarget.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Alias As String
public: property System::String ^ Alias { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得使用者代理程式的別名。

value.span: 用於參考特定使用者代理程式的名稱。

span.span: The name used to refer to a specific user agent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是指`alias`屬性`add`中的項目`clientTarget`組態檔區段。The property refers to the `alias` attribute of the `add` element in the `clientTarget` section of the configuration file. ASP.NET 組態預設值包括下列別名：The ASP.NET configuration defaults include the following aliases: - `uplevel`這會告知 ASP.NET 將 HTML 和 Internet Explorer 6.0 和更新版本所支援 ECMAScript。`uplevel`, which tells ASP.NET to send HTML and ECMAScript that is supported by Internet Explorer 6.0 and later versions. - `downlevel`這會告知 ASP.NET，限制的 HTML 和指令碼的版本早於 Internet Explorer 6.0 支援的瀏覽器。`downlevel`, which tells ASP.NET to limit the HTML and script to the versions that are supported by browsers earlier than Internet Explorer 6.0. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得從現有的 Web 應用程式的組態檔。The following code example shows how to get the from the configuration file of an existing Web application. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget/CS/clienttarget.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget/VB/clienttarget.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UserAgent As String
public: property System::String ^ UserAgent { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得使用者代理程式的識別名稱。

span.span: Gets the user agent's identification name.

value.span: 使用者代理程式的識別名稱。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是指`userAgent`屬性`add`中的項目`clientTarget`組態檔區段。The property refers to the `userAgent` attribute of the `add` element in the `clientTarget` section of the configuration file. ASP.NET 組態預設值可讓您自訂各種 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本的頁面。The ASP.NET configuration defaults allow customizing pages for various Microsoft Internet Explorer versions. 您可以在它們之間找到別名`uplevel`，這會告知 ASP.NET 將用戶端 HTML 和 Internet Explorer 4.0 和更新版本中，支援 ECMAScript 和`downlevel`，這會告知 ASP.NET HTML 以及比舊版瀏覽器所支援的指令碼，以限制Internet Explorer 4.0。Among them you find the alias `uplevel`, which tells ASP.NET to send the client HTML and ECMAScript supported by Internet Explorer 4.0 and later, and `downlevel`, which tells ASP.NET to limit the HTML and script to that supported by earlier browsers than Internet Explorer 4.0. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得從現有的 Web 應用程式的組態檔。The following code example shows how to get the from the configuration file of an existing Web application. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget/CS/clienttarget.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget/VB/clienttarget.vb#4)]
